DOC.brief_title: Proteomic Analysis Mononuclear Cells After High-Fat , High-Carbohydrate Meal With Without Orange Juice
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : A high-fat , high-carbohydrate meal ( HFHC ) induce increase inflammation peripheral-blood mononuclear cell healthy subject . A study show orange juice , consume together high-fat meal , able revert increase inflammatory marker . OBJECTIVES : To study effect single HFHC meal take water , orange juice ( 500ml ) isocaloric glucose drink protein expression peripheral blood mononuclear cell healthy individual . DESIGN AND METHODOLOGY : Twelve healthy , normal weight individual consume HFHC meal water , water glucose orange juice cross-over design least one week interval meal . Blood sample collect , 1 , 3 5h meal . Blood glucose , insulin lipid profile measure . Also , proteome analysis use TMT label perform peripheral-blood mononuclear cell collect time 3 5h meal .
DOC.criteria: healthy normal weight nonvegetarian use medication alcohol consumption , intense physical exercise pregnant lactating overweight obese drug abuse disease diabetes , inflammatory condition .
